user_sentiment: satisfied with findings, ready to move to implementation phase
execution_quality: The agent delegated investigation to a subagent and successfully synthesized findings into a detailed summary, though the initial response may not have fully captured all nuances requested.
work_category: Investigation and analysis task to evaluate an existing system prompt and changelog system, identifying gaps and areas for improvement by consulting external references.
summary: Agent successfully investigated the system prompt and changelog system, delegating research to a subagent to examine external sources (Twitter changelog bot, official changelogs). The user accepted the detailed findings and immediately proceeded to the next phase without requesting clarification, indicating the investigation met expectations. Minor deduction from perfect score due to potential gaps in external source integration that user may have discovered in follow-up work.
follow_up_pattern: User accepted findings and immediately moved to next phase (improving gaps by implementing additions), indicating findings were adequate
